papers.title: Mesh4D: 4D Mesh Reconstruction and Tracking from Monocular Video
QNeRF: Neural Radiance Fields on a Simulated Gate-Based Quantum Computer
RL-AWB: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Auto White Balance Correction in Low-Light Night-time Scenes

items.title: Mesh4D: Rapid Monocular 4D Reconstruction via Latent Diffusion
items.summary: Mesh4D reconstructs full 3D object motion from monocular video using a skeletal-guided latent diffusion model in a single feed-forward pass.
items.authors: Zeren Jiang, Chuanxia Zheng, Iro Laina

items.title: QNeRF: Hybrid Quantum Circuits for Efficient Novel-View Synthesis
items.summary: QNeRF is the first hybrid quantum-classical model for 3D scene representation, achieving state-of-the-art performance with 50% fewer parameters than classical NeRFs.
items.authors: Daniele Lizzio Bosco, Shuteng Wang, Giuseppe Serra

items.title: Pixel-Perfect Depth: Clean Point Clouds via Pixel-Space Diffusion
items.summary: PPD and PPVD utilize semantics-prompted diffusion transformers to generate high-fidelity, flying-pixel-free 3D geometry from monocular images and video.
items.authors: Gangwei Xu, Haotong Lin, Hongcheng Luo

items.title: PlenopticDreamer: Synchronizing Multi-View Generative Video Re-rendering
items.summary: A framework that achieves spatio-temporal consistency in multi-view video generation using a retrieval-augmented autoregressive model and robust long-range conditioning.
items.authors: Xiao Fu, Shitao Tang, Min Shi

items.title: RL-AWB: Reinforcement Learning for Superior Nighttime Color Constancy
items.summary: RL-AWB combines a specialized nighttime statistical algorithm with deep reinforcement learning to dynamically optimize white balance parameters for low-light imagery.
items.authors: Yuan-Kang Lee, Kuan-Lin Chen, Chia-Che Chang
